VisionFirstPage.metaDescription: Explore Vibecodr's Vision-First approach: CodeGuide (AI PRD assistant), Wireframes, Technical Blueprint. Define, validate, and structure your digital product before development.

hero.description: The methodology that transforms your ideas into structured, validated digital products ready for development.

problem.title: An alarming observation
problem.description: 70% of digital projects fail before launch. Why? A poorly defined product vision, unrealistic expectations, and poor communication with developers.

documentation.title: Insufficient documentation
documentation.description: Poorly documented needs lead to costly misunderstandings and products that don't meet expectations.

misunderstanding.title: Mutual misunderstanding
misunderstanding.description: The gap between entrepreneurs and developers creates frustration, delays, and budget overruns.

unsuitable.title: Unsuitable solutions
unsuitable.description: Generic or overly complex solutions do not solve your company's specific problems.

approach.title: The Vision-First Approach
approach.description: Our unique methodology guides you step-by-step to define, structure, and validate your product vision before starting development.

demo.title: CodeGuide in action
demo.description: The AI assistant that transforms your ideas into a structured PRD, personas, user stories, and wireframes. Ask questions, refine your vision, and generate clear documentation for your product.

chat.user1: How can I create a wireframe for my time management application?

ai1.line1: I will help you create your wireframe. Go to the "Wireframes" tab in CodeGuide and follow these steps:
ai1.item2: Add interface elements (buttons, text fields, etc.)
ai1.item3: Organize them according to your vision
ai1.line2: Would you like to start with a time management dashboard template?

chat.user2: Yes, please. And can you also show me how to link this wireframe to my user stories?

ai2.line1: I've added a dashboard template to your project. To link your wireframes to user stories:
ai2.item2: Click on "Link to user stories" in the menu
ai2.line2: This bidirectional traceability helps your development team understand how each feature should be visually implemented.

LegalPage.metaDescription: Legal notice and privacy policy of Vibecodr. Information about the publisher, hosting and protection of your personal data.
LegalPage.title: Legal Notice

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: This entire site is subject to French and international legislation on copyright and intellectual property. All reproduction rights are reserved, including for downloadable documents and iconographic and photographic representations.

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: The information contained on this site is as accurate as possible and the site is updated at different times of the year, but may however contain inaccuracies or omissions. If you notice a gap, error or what appears to be a malfunction, please report it by email to contact@vibecodr.ai, describing the problem as precisely as possible.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Vibecodr is committed to protecting the confidentiality of your personal data. This policy describes the information we collect, how we use it and your rights regarding this data.

dataUsage.title: Use of Data
dataUsage.newsletter: Send you our newsletter (with your consent)

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, exchange or transfer your personal data to third parties, except for legal obligations or for technical service providers necessary for the operation of the service (hosting, email).

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
rights.access: Right of access to your data

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: To exercise your rights or for any questions regarding this policy, contact us at: contact@vibecodr.ai
